MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G66 postcode area of Kirkintilloch, affecting properties in Caurnie View and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.53pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a damaged underground cable and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:19pm on 17th November 2020.
